[vc_row el_class=”industry-innerpage-content”][vc_column][vc_column_text]Legal & Secretarial services have been gaining respect from the corporate world and comprise compliances on statutory and legal issues. Corporate secretarial services are the supporting structure to the company regardless of the nature of the company; and determine the company ownership, company law adherence, corporate governance, company records, holding of Annual General Meetings (AGMs), virtual legal services through a virtual legal officer, etc.

Legal and Secretarial | Virtual Legal Services | Virtual Legal Officer

We partner with an enthusiastic team of Company Secretaries (CS), chartered accountant services, and Law professionals and advise clients across corporate, Call Center Setup, legal & secretarial advisory services in India. With the business-oriented approach and rich experience across different sectors, our team is well equipped to provide seamless advisory, and compliance solutions for all your HR shared services and corporate secretarial matters.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”industry-innerpage-content”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

  • Virtual Legal Officer (VLO)

    With the changing times and the new social distancing norms, many companies are looking forward to hiring people who can work on a contract. Here chief legal officers come in handy. They are veterans handling multiple clients, handling your legal affairs, and providing sound advice based on their past experiences.

  • Virtual Secretarial Officer (VSO)

    A Virtual secretarial officer has the same responsibilities as the company secretary, like shareholders’ administration and communication, corporate governance, and statutory compliance. The differential part is that the CSO will be handling it virtually rather than being there on the site, which helps the company save costs and reduces the chances of errors.

  • Business Setup and Registrations

    Setting up and registering the company or business has always been tiresome. JARKSCTC helps you connect with the best business consulting firms in India who will set up and register your business as per the government rules and regulations.

  • Management of Contracts

    Contract Management is managing the execution, performance, modification, negotiation, and termination of the contracts with the parties. JARKSCTC connects you to the best legal consultancies to handle; these contracts so that you can focus on what matters to you the most.

  • Due Diligence

    Due Diligence means a proper investigation of a business; or verification or research on the accuracy of a statement required in a corporate transaction with a certain standard of care. It includes investigating an investment audit, a review of all financial records, verification of legal matters, etc.

  • Winding Up of Companies

    Our assured CS consultancies can help wind up your businesses by providing the correct procedures and ensuring that everything is in the process, like – notices in the local newspaper, the appointment of the official liquidator, hearing of courts, and approval from ROCs.

  • India Entry Strategy & Foreign Entity Management

    India is a premium and most sought-after destination for international investors looking to set up their businesses in India. We offer a favorable atmosphere for business while offering incredible opportunities for investors. As a result, India has witnessed a consistent surge in foreign direct investment. However, for a foreign investor, there still are several risks associated with Indian entry advisory companies having complicated accounting, taxation, statutory, and regulatory environment.
    At JARKSCTC, our specialized partners help comprehend the country’s process and governing laws. They make getting approvals for commencement of operations smooth in line with the nature of business.

VLO & VCO

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
